articles.title: Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5’s Power Consumption Is Around The Same As The Snapdragon 8 Elite But The Chipset Doubles Down On Performance - Wccftech
articles.description: Likely due to TSMC’s 3nm ‘N3P’ process, a rumor claims that the power consumption of the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 will be around the same as the Snapdragon 8 Elite
articles.content: Qualcomm has to wait an entire year before it showcases the capabilities of its first 2nm chipset, but later this month, it is expected to introduce a slightly more powerful version of its current-ge… [+2163 chars]

articles.title: The iPhone Alarm Picker Feels Like Magic Until You Realize It Is Just a List That Stops Dead At 4:39 - Wccftech
articles.content: When you pull up the alarm on your iPhone, you are greeted by what looks like a classic spinning wheel of hours and minutes. Swiping up or down on either would give you an endless, circular dial that… [+1938 chars]
